=== About me ===
My name is Diego Tejera, actual leader of Ubuntu Loco Team Panama, Systems engineer, software developer, Co-Founder of <nowiki>[[http://www.rootstack.com|Rootstack]]</nowiki>.

{{https://launchpadlibrarian.net/73593729/diego.jpg}}

=== My involvement in Ubuntu ===
I have been using Ubuntu since Dapper Drake (6.06). I met <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/Eivar|Eivar Montenegro]]</nowiki> at the beginning of 2008 (just after we worked on the FLISOL of that year), He introduced me to the Ubuntu Loco Team of Panama (not official yet) and I have been an active member on the community since that. 

I have been in charge of Ubuntu Panama since 2010 and i have been organizing ubuntu related activities in my country such as <nowiki>[[http://potty-fedoraproject.blogspot.com/2010/11/fedora-ubuntu-release-party.html|release parties]]</nowiki>, activities to <nowiki>[[http://diegotejera.org/?p=26|spread ubuntu]]</nowiki> and I give talks about Ubuntu on <nowiki>[[https://picasaweb.google.com/alejandro.perez.torres/Flisol2011Panama|Free/Libre Software related events]]</nowiki>. I have also wrote some small <nowiki>[[http://diegotejera.org/?p=13|ubuntu tips]]</nowiki>.

I usually give ubuntu related support on #ubuntu-es, #floss-pa and Panama's Ubuntu mailing list.
